title: Fight Hole
description: The galaxy’s number-one battle arena show. From the Danger Belt, the single elimination slugfest where battle-hardened contestants jump into a hole and fight! Whoever’s left standing by the end wins.
quote: Outta the hole! Outta the game!
altHero: the space arena at the Danger Belt
alt1: crowd cheering as spotlights fill the arena
alt3: hosts R.B-O.T. and R.9-C.R, two flying drone-like robots
alt4: Krosh, a huge champion of Fight Hole
